titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Export-Import Bank of the United States from providing financing to persons with seriously delinquent tax debt.
A bill to prohibit the Export-Import Bank of the United States from providing financing to persons with seriously delinquent tax debt.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the Export-Import Bank from providing financing to a person with seriously delinquent tax debt or for a project in which any participant has seriously delinquent tax debt.
